title: talks
subtitle: Conferences, talks and workshops to stay updated

cards.title: Dicas de como evoluir profissionalmente como Desenvolvedor Web
cards.description: Bruno começou a carreira como desenvolvedor web em Piracicaba e hoje trabalha na Cisco em Orlando/FL. Além disso é consultor JavaScript focado em React JS e Organizador do Orlando JS Meetup.

cards.title: Dicas de como evoluir profissionalmente como Desenvolvedor de Software (também no exterior)
Full JAM Stack React Developer
cards.description: The JAM stack is a modern web development architecture based on client-side JavaScript and reusable APIs.

cards.title: React e comunidade salvaram minha vida
Renderizando componentes React no servidor
cards.description: O ReactJS tem a poderosa habilidade de renderizar seus componentes no servidor. Nesta apresentação Bruno irá mostrar os benefícios e também como e quando podemos explorar esta prática.

cards.title: Let's build React Components together
cards.description: The main idea of this live coding is to 'think the React way'. With that said, it really doesn't matter your knowledge on React, since we are going to do this together.

cards.title: The Future of React With Universal Applications
Now is the best time to be a Front-End Developer
cards.description: It’s hard to measure a developer’s knowledge based only on the term “front end developer.”

cards.title: Essential JavaScript Libraries to Improve Your Workflow
Improving your Sublime Text 3 workflow
cards.description: I'll be covering the editor settings, command palette, projects, 'must have' packages (plugins), themes and also keyboard shortcuts to improve your workflow.
